name: Achromatic (itch) (EthanMango, NoButYes)
description:
Made for the utGDDC Gamemaking Deathmatch 2020-2021

A mysterious presence has stripped our protagonist of his abilities and trapped him in a tower to keep him powerless. Help him escape this world devoid of color through this challenging platformer centered around discovering new movement mechanics and obstacles. 

This game is intentionally difficult, but for the purpose of playability, we have added a skip to next checkpoint button in the options menu so that anyone playing can experience the entire game regardless.

Average playtime: 25-45 minutes

If you're stuck on a certain part of the game or would like to watch a full playthrough, we uploaded an under 9 minute video demonstrating the entire game.
